title: Emerald Cascade Haaram - A Regal Embrace
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with vibrant
pear-shaped Emeralds of exceptional clarity and brilliant-cut Diamonds. Setting is prong and pave.
features: This exquisite necklace features a cascading design, resembling a waterfall of emeralds and diamonds. The delicate diamond foliage motif adds a touch of nature-inspired elegance. The prong setting showcases the emeralds' vibrant green color, while the pave-set diamonds provide maximum sparkle. The necklace blends traditional Haaram elements with modern design sensibilities.
colors: The color palette is dominated by the rich green of the Emeralds
complemented by the sparkling white of the Diamonds and the warm yellow of the 18K Gold.
occasions: Perfect for grand celebrations like weddings (Vivaaham)
and high-profile events. Also suitable for formal dinners and cocktail parties. A statement piece for the modern bride or anyone seeking to make a lasting impression.
description: This Emerald Cascade Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, showcasing the finest emeralds and diamonds. Its unique design seamlessly blends traditional and contemporary elements, making it a versatile piece for any occasion. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish that will last for generations. Own a piece of timeless elegance and make a statement wherever you go.
